pr_title: Remove references to Apps from JmriConfigurationManager

timeline.message: remove reference to apps from JmriConfigurationManager

timeline.bodyText: Do you intend to leave this reference to apps intact?
timeline.author: rhwood

replies.bodyText:
We'll fix that, along with any other references to bundles, but the first goal is to make the code compile separately.
I missed it in my other PR.
replies.author: pabender

timeline.bodyText: Given that 3 other classes in jmri also use TabbedPreferencesAction, it would be better to provide a preferences window launching action that does not rely on apps instead of breaking apart JmriConfigurationManager.
timeline.author: rhwood

replies.bodyText:
Cleaning up JmriConfigurationManager needed to be done in any case.
I will look into those other uses you mention.
replies.author: pabender

timeline.message: use a preferences action factory to gain access to tabbed preferences where required.
